amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Atomic Energy Defense Activities National Nuclear Security Administration, Weapons Activities Account by $25 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Atomic Energy Defense Activities National Nuclear Security Administration, Weapons Activities Account by $25 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 149 - 272 (Roll no. 204).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
